column2: Hide Change RGO Options\n\nNote: If you don't see any options, scroll down in your decisions menu to see options that are currently unavailable to you.

Allows the switching of a single colonial RGO province of the following types: Coal, Iron, or Sulphur into Coal, Iron, or Sulphur. This Decision has a 5 year cooldown.\n\nShares cooldowns with §YChange Mining RGO (State)

Allows the switching of a single colonial RGO province of the following types: Grain, Fruit, Fish, Cattle, Wool, Cotton, or Silk into Grain, Fruit, Fish, Cattle, Wool, Cotton, or Silk. This Decision has a 5 year cooldown.\n\nShares cooldowns with §YChange Agriculture RGO (State)

Allows the switching of a single non-colonial RGO province of the following types: Coal, Iron, or Sulphur into Coal, Iron, or Sulphur. This Decision has a 5 year cooldown.\n\nShares cooldowns with §GChange Mining RGO (Colony)

Allows the switching of a single non-colonial RGO province of the following types: Grain, Fruit, Fish, Cattle, Wool, Cotton, or Silk into Grain, Fruit, Fish, Cattle, Wool, Cotton, or Silk. This Decision has a 5 year cooldown.\n\nShares cooldowns with §GChange Agriculture RGO (Colony)

Our Vassals have found a way to use their unique connection to their respective Treaty Ports to encourage population growth!
Consolidate our hold over the Treaty Ports.
No longer can a foreign Nation deny that our Treaty Ports belong to us, for now and forever!
We no longer have need of their special administration over the treaty port and will integrate them fully into our state.
We no longer have need of their special administration over the treaty port and will integrate them fully into our state.
We no longer have need of their special administration over the treaty port and will integrate them fully into our state.
We no longer have need of their special administration over the treaty port and will integrate them fully into our state.
We no longer have need of their special administration over the treaty port and will integrate them fully into our state.
We no longer have need of their special administration over the treaty port and will integrate them fully into our state.
Our kin in Fulo yearn for our protection. So we should grant it.
Stop legal discrimination of the Maghrebi.
The Breton and Welsh peoples will be granted equal rights under our great nation!
We need to expan our foothold in Iberia if we are ever to be truly secure.
With the rising andalucian influence in Iberia we need to defend our brothers in Catalonia by taking them under our wing.
If we are able to control Yemen then the arabian trade to India has to go through us.
India will be declared the crown jewel of our empire.
We really are the rightful rulers of atleast northern Italy. It is time everyone recognizes this.
The swiss and the italians have always been one people. Today our dream of a unified nation-state is realised.
Now that we own Alsace, it is time to make sure the proper people are living it it.
Thank the Hamster or this wouldn't be here
The nuer people are an integral part of our Empire. It is time they are recognized as such.
Our people may live on the other side of the channel, but they are still our people. It is time they are brought into the fold.
Ukrainians and Latvians are a brother-people. Anyone who claims otherwise is wrong.
Increases Assimilation of polish pops to our culture.
Increases Assimilation of russian pops to our culture. Remember that Assimilation requires a province to be stated.
We have reestablished control over our home Island. The only question that remains is: "who can stop us from continuing the march west?
The bairisch are not the same as the other so called germans beyond the Alps. They can be integrated into our country.
The Hanoveran state has served its purpose. Its time to integrate them into Lavland proper.
The Scandinavian threat is as strong as ever. We need to stand united with the flanish people to defend ourselves.
Now that we own Alsace, it is time to make sure the proper people are living it it.
The herero to the south of us have for too long lived in mud huts without proper sanitation. It is time for us to show them what a civilised society looks like.
The Xhosa have too long been a thorn in our side. Now we have the strength to pacify the region forever.
For too long have the Tswana people of the Cape been opressed by foreign masters. It's high time we liberate them.
The Kanem Empire as long since ceased to be one. They need protection from foreign influence. We will grant it.
The greeks, once the light of the known world have now fallen and are being besieged on all sides by foreign conquerors. We need to move quickly if we are to save them.
All people of the true faith are finally united under one banner.
The City of Roma is the cradle of our empire and should be returned to us.
If we mange to unite all the northern country under our flag we will be able to dominate the region for decades to come.
For too long have the flanish been slaves to the lavlandisk. We have the strength to liberate them.
There is no longer any valid reason to supress the czech language. It is high time we embrace the czech people as our own.
Just as we welcomed the Czechs to our Nation, so should we embrace the Slovaks.
The Circassians have been fully subjugated. Now we must begin the process of integrating them so that they may serve the state.
If we ever are to unite all Germans under one flag we must secure territorial integrity.
All German lands are under our rule. It is time we unite under one banner to defend against those who wish to take them from us!
The noble Xhosa are under constant attack by the dastardly Luba. To guarantee their continued independence we must step up as their protector.
England cannot be allowed to threaten our coasts with impunity. We will stop them.
Too long have the Malagasy people suffered under the yoke of their foreign occupiers. We come to liberate them.
Our kin in Fulo yearn for our protection. So we should grant it.
The Janeirans have taken good care of their land. They may continue cultavating it, under our supervision of course.
The Janeirans must be protected from foreign encroachment. We will take them under our wing.
If this is your first time playing England, click this decision.
If this is your first time playing a nation in the Kurdish Kerfuffle, click this decision.
If this is your first time playing a nation in the Great Lakes Region, click this decision.
Aquire the Kwanchowan Treaty Port, located in the south of Chinas coast.
Aquire the Suzhou Treaty Port, located in the east of Chinas coast.
Aquire the Honk Kong Treaty Port, located in the south of Chinas coast.
Aquire the Wuchang Treaty Port, located in the center of Chinas coast.
Aquire the Fengyang Treaty Port, located in the center of Chinas coast.
Aquire the Zhenjiang Treaty Port, located in the center of Chinas coast.
Aquire the Ningbo Treaty Port, located in the east of Chinas coast.
Aquire the Jinan Treaty Port, located in the northeast of Chinas coast.
Aquire the Caozhou Treaty Port, located in the northeast of Chinas coast.
Aquire the Huizhou Treaty Port, located in the south of Chinas coast.
We have weathered the storm of foreign powers trying to claim our land as theirs. Noone can deny our ownership over Alsace.
Now that we own Alsace, it is time to make sure the proper people are living it it.
We have secured the strategic region of the Malay Pensinsula. Now we only need to make sure we stay in control of it.
A fellow people that has suffered chinese opression for far to long. We must unite so the Chinese scourge may never threaten us again.
Consolidate our rule over the Maghrebi
Now that we own the majority of all maghrebi land we can claim them as a core part of our empire.
It would be more fruitful for us to spend our efforts somewhere else, rather than trying to regain our lost territory of Sicily. We reject our claims over Sicily.
The new world is no longer a mere colony of ours. The political balance has long since shifted west, it is time we move our capital to reflect this new reality.
Now that we have weathered the storm of the civil war, we can project power west, to reclaim the lesser slavs.
The foreign invaders threaten the security of our dear neighbours. To safeguard their independence we must take them under our wing.
